q: Dakota and former Rick Santorum of Pennsylvania. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are "very routine" for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings.___

gave the 76ers a 99-92 lead with 6:15 to play. The Rockets cut the deficit to 101-97, but Allen Iverson drained a three-pointer with 3:48 remaining and Houston got no closer than seven the rest of the way. We executed at the end, whereas previous games we didn't do that, said Allen Iverson , who committed no turnovers. "This is a confidence boost for us. We played with control when we got the lead in the fourth quarter and we played solid defense all game long."

aan het licht in mei 2004, toen in de Amerikaanse pers foto's verschenen van Amerikaanse gevangenisbewaarders in Irak die gedetineerden mishandelden en vernederden.
